episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
Hey hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Guess what I’ve got!

Ta-da! It’s a ticket for a traveling amusement
park!
I got it by winning a puzzle sweepstakes! ♪
And it’s not just this one. I’ve got a second ticket!
...Ah! You look like you’ve something to say.

I know what you’re thinking,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You’re wondering why I don’t just go with my
friends from Kalos...right?

I mean, Serena and Calem seem to have their
hands full as Neo Champions...

Trevor is putting all his time into his studies with
Mr. Jacq and the other Pokémon Professors...

And Tierny’s totally absorbed in dancing with
Kiawe and Dahlia!

So I’m having a hard time finding anyone who’d
want to go with me, you know?
*intense stare*
(Ask if she’d like to go together.)
Huh? You mean it? Yay! ♪

To be honest, everyone being busy was kind of
an excuse. I really wanted to go with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! ♪
(Ask her what she’s trying to say.)
Ugh! You’re so dense!
I’m inviting you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

I wanna get to know you more, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

This is a chance to hang out together and get even
closer as friends.

After all, I want to make a lot of
great memories! ♪

What kind of rides could they have?
I wonder if they’re selling anything yummy!
I can’t wait to go to the amusement park!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Shauna enjoyed
the amusement park together.

To finish out the day, they decided to ride the
ferris wheel.
Check it out! You can see so far!

Is this what people mean by breathtaking
scenery?!

I never ever want to forget this, so I’ll keep this
memory in an album in my heart!

Thanks for coming with me today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I got to learn so much about you! ♪
When I look at you, Serena, or the others...
you’re so brilliant that I get kinda jealous...

Everyone shines when doing the things they want
with all they’ve got!

But you know, I don’t really have a clear goal
like everyone else.

I’ve kinda just kept making memories as a Trainer
without thinking about it much.
What is it I want to do...?
Just kidding! ♪

(Tell Shauna there are people who
look up to her.)
To me...?

I see. So all these precious experiences I’ve built
up can one day become something others can look
up to.

(Tell Shauna she cherishes the present
more than anyone else.)
Huh?! Y-you really think so?

I wonder if I’m also becoming a fantastic version
of myself, just like everyone else.
Hey! Let’s totally come here again!

After all, there are lots more memories I’d like to
make with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
